SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY notice_write_date DESC) AS rnum, notice_num, notice_title, notice_visible, notice_write_date, notice_start_date, notice_end_date FROM notices WHERE notice_visible != '02' AND notice_title LIKE #{keyword} AND (notice_end_date IS NULL OR notice_end_date >= SYSDATE) AND (notice_start_date IS NULL OR notice_start_date <= SYSDATE)
) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notices WHERE notice_visible != '02' AND notice_title LIKE #{keyword} AND (notice_end_date IS NULL OR notice_end_date >= SYSDATE) AND (notice_start_date IS NULL OR notice_start_date <= SYSDATE)

SELECT notice_num, notice_title, notice_visible, notice_content, manager_id, notice_write_date, notice_start_date, notice_end_date FROM notices WHERE notice_num = #{notice_num} AND (notice_end_date IS NULL OR notice_end_date >= SYSDATE) AND (notice_start_date IS NULL OR notice_start_date <= SYSDATE)
